pr_title: Add support for Tekton Triggers to the Tekton extension, fixes #2043

timeline.message: Add support for Tekton Triggers to the Tekton extension, fixes #2043
Add support for Tekton Triggers to the Tekton extension, fixes #2043

timeline.bodyText: I see this class is duplicated for each tekton model module. Do you think we can avoid this somehow by maybe adding tekton-model as dependency? Or Are triggers independent of both v1alpha1 or v1beta1 models?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: Good Point! I replaced it with a v1beta1 model dependency
replies.author: Fabian-K
